


<!-- @namespace    sugar.node.fs -->

# ```js emptyDir ```


Empty a directory (async)

## Parameters

- **dir**  String: The directory path to empty



## Example (js)

```js
const emptyDir = require('@coffeekraken/node/fs/emptyDir');
emptyDir('my/cool/directory').then(() => {
   // do something...
});
```
